parameters.name: createTime
parameters.description: The time when the API MCP server was created.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the API MCP service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the API MCP service.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The search keyword. Supports fuzzy search by API name and exact search by API ID.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the API reference for the API MCP service. The language of the prompt can affect the response from the AI. Valid values: \`ZH\_CN\`, \`EN\_US\`.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page for a paged query. The maximum value is 100. The default value is 20.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used to start the next query. Set this parameter to the \`nextToken\` value that was returned from the previous API call.

> This parameter is not required for the first query. If a query does not return all results, pass the \`nextToken\` value from the previous query to continue.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of data entries to skip.

parameters.name: sourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the API MCP service.

- custom: a custom service

- system: a system service

parameters.name: updateTime
parameters.description: The time when the API MCP server was last updated.
